title: Our Journey
description: Established in 2010, The Big Fish began as a small 'local kiosk' for the middleclass working class in Westlands Today, we're Nairobi's premier fish catering service, bringing ocean-fresh flavors to every event.

title: Premium Catering
description: We specialize in off-site fish catering for corporate events, weddings, and private gatherings. Our mobile kitchens bring restaurant-quality seafood directly to your venue.

title: Sustainable Sourcing
description: We partner with local fishermen and sustainable fisheries to ensure the freshest catch while protecting marine ecosystems for future generations.

title: Event Expertise
description: From  dinners of 20 to grand celebrations of 500+, our experienced team handles every detail. We've catered over 1,000 events across Kenya.
